<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <entry>70949</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-UL-id</catalog>
    <entry>trubar1:colos_en/140354</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:colos_en/140354</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:colos_en/140354</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Dva nabita valja v izolatorju</string>
            <string language="en">Two charged cylinders surrounded by insulator</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwei luden die Zylinder auf, die durch Isolierung
umgeben wurden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Deux cylindres chargés entourés par le 
isolateur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dois carregaram os cilindros cercados pelo 
isolador</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Due hanno caricato i cilindri circondati 
dall'isolante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύο χρέωσαν τους κυλίνδρους που περιβλήθηκαν από το 
μονωτή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dos cilindros cargados rodeados por el aislador</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">V dva valja spustimo nabite delce in opazujemo njihovo razporeditev glede na razdaljo in velikost valja.</string>
            <string language="en">Charged particles are released into two cylinders that are surrounded by insulator. Observe the particle arrangement in relation to cylinder size and distance between them.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električni naboj</string>
            <string language="en">electric charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">izolator</string>
            <string language="en">insulator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">jacob</string>
            <string language="en">jacob</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Belastete Partikel werden in zwei Zylinder 
freigegeben, die durch Isolierung umgeben werden. Beobachten Sie
die Partikelanordnung in bezug auf einen Zylindergröße und -abstand 
zwischen ihnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des particules chargées sont déchargées dans 
deux cylindres qui sont entourés par le isolateur. Observez 
l'agencement de particules par rapport à la taille et à la distance 
de cylindre entre elles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As partículas carregadas são liberadas em dois 
cilindros que são cercados pelo isolador. Observe o arranjo da 
partícula com relação ao tamanho e à distância do cilindro entre 
eles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le particelle caricate sono scaricate in due 
cilindri che sono circondati dall'isolante. Osservi la 
disposizione della particella rispetto al formato ed alla distanza del
cilindro fra loro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα χρεωμένα μόρια εκδίδονται σε δύο κυλίνδρους που 
περιβάλλονται από το μονωτή. Παρατηρήστε τη ρύθμιση μορίων
σε σχέση με το μέγεθος κυλίνδρων και την απόσταση μεταξύ τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las partículas cargadas release/versión en dos 
cilindros que sean rodeados por el aislador. Observe el arreglo 
de la partícula en lo referente a talla y a distancia del cilindro 
entre ellas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Ladung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Isolierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">jacob</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">charge électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">isolateur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jacob</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">carga elétrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">isolador</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">jacob</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">carica elettrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">isolante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">jacob</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρική δαπάνη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονωτής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">jacob</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">carga eléctrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">aislador</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">jacob</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
